alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 30 at 12:23AM CST until December 30 at 10:32AM CST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...Tennessee... Lookout Creek near New England affecting Dade and Hamilton Counties. For the Lookout Creek...including New England...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lookout Creek near New England. * WHEN...From early this morning to late this morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Minor flooding expands along Sells Lane in Trenton...Mason Road near Rising Fawn...and Creek Road near New England. All these roads will be closed. Also minor flooding expands much further downstream as the creek crosses the Tennessee border into the Tiftonia area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 11.9 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of around 13.2 feet early this morning. It will then fall below flood stage early this morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
